root.name: Movie Challenge
root.description: Movie Challenge in a Movie trivia game featured on the iPhone. It is powered by the Inquizitor game engine featured in all of Redwind Software trivia games. It features 11 question styles ranging from multiple choice, true or false, name the quote, what year was it release, organise chronologically and more. It also has 10 categories of questions from Actors/Actresses, Directors, Comedy, Horror, SciFi and so on including DLC categories featuring Harry Potter, Godfather and Classic film specific questions. The game also includes power-ups similar to life-lines in many modern game shows which can be used to reveal clues, give additional time or see what the most common answers are.
